verses.verse: וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> ve-zik-Nei with the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying שָׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> sha-Mor Keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah, all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Veh which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. you this day

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah, shall be on בַּיּוֹם֮ <S%H3117><s%> bai-yOm And it shall be on the day אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher when תַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> ta-'av-Ru when ye shall pass over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָ֑ךְ Lach; וַהֲקֵמֹתָ֤ <S%H6965><s%> va-ha-ke-mo-Ta thee that thou shalt set thee up לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim stones גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot, great וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <S%H7874><s%> ve-sad-Ta and plaister אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <S%H7874><s%> bas-Sid. and coat

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <S%H3789><s%> ve-cha-tav-Ta And thou shalt write עֲלֵיהֶ֗ן <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hen, and אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei upon them all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot you בְּעָבְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H5674><s%> be-'a-ve-Re-cha; when thou art passed over לְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an so אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which תָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo that thou mayest go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz unto the land אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ׀ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz thee a land זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat that floweth חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash, and honey כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber hath promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei- God אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha of thy fathers לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְהָיָה֮ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become בְּעָבְרְכֶ֣ם <S%H5674><s%> be-'a-ve-re-Chem Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den Jordan תָּקִ֜ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> ta-Ki-mu [that] ye shall set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> ha-'a-va-Nim these stones הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher as אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-Veh which I command אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom you this day בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har in mount עֵיבָ֑ל <S%H5858><s%> 'ei-Val; Ebal וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <S%H7874><s%> ve-sad-Ta them with plaister אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <S%H7874><s%> bas-Sid. shall coat

וּבָנִ֤יתָ <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Ni-ta And there shalt thou build שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach, an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach an altar אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim, of stones לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> ta-Nif thou shalt not lift up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> bar-Zel. [any] iron

אֲבָנִ֤ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim stones שְׁלֵמוֹת֙ <S%H8003><s%> she-le-mOt of whole תִּבְנֶ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> tiv-Neh, Thou shalt build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וְהַעֲלִ֤יתָ <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-Li-ta and thou shalt offer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav on עוֹלֹ֔ת <S%H5930><s%> o-Lot, burnt offerings לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh thereon unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְזָבַחְתָּ֥ <S%H2076><s%> ve-za-vach-Ta And thou shalt offer שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim peace offerings וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-Chal-ta and shalt eat שָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וְשָׂ֣מַחְתָּ֔ <S%H8055><s%> ve-Sa-mach-ta, there and rejoice לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <S%H3789><s%> ve-cha-tav-Ta And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאֲבָנִ֗ים <S%H68><s%> ha-'a-va-Nim, upon the stones אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot likewise בַּאֵ֥ר <S%H874><s%> ba-'Er plainly הֵיטֵֽב׃ <S%H3190><s%> hei-Tev. very ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-ko-ha-Nim and the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites אֶ֥ל <S%H413><s%> 'el to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El unto all Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הַסְכֵּ֤ת׀ <S%H5535><s%> has-Ket Take heed וּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> u-she-Ma' and hearken יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, O Israel הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom this day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh This נִהְיֵ֣יתָֽ <S%H1961><s%> nih-Yei-ta thou art become לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am, the people לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְשָׁ֣מַעְתָּ֔ <S%H8085><s%> ve-Sha-ma'-ta, Thou shalt therefore obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְוֹתָו֙ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav his commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֻקָּ֔יו <S%H2706><s%> chuk-Kav, and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. thee this day ס sa-Mek

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav charged מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, the people בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom the same day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these יַֽעַמְד֞וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du These shall stand לְבָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> le-va-Rech to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har upon mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <S%H1630><s%> ge-ri-Zim, Gerizim בְּעָבְרְכֶ֖ם <S%H5674><s%> be-'a-ve-re-Chem when ye are come over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; Jordan שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <S%H8095><s%> shim-'On Simeon וְלֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> ve-le-Vi and Levi וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah, and Judah וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> ve-yis-so-sh-Char and Issachar וְיוֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef and Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min. and Benjamin

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh these יַֽעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du And these shall stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- For הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> hak-ke-la-Lah to curse בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har upon mount עֵיבָ֑ל <S%H5858><s%> 'ei-Val; Ebal רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven Reuben גָּ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> gad Gad וְאָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> ve-'a-Sher, and Asher וּזְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> u-ze-vu-Lun and Zebulun דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> dan Dan וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> ve-naf-ta-Li. and Naphtali

וְעָנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'a-Nu shall speak הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, And the Levites וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol voice רָֽם׃ <S%H7311><s%> Ram. with a loud ס sa-Mek

אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed הָאִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh that maketh פֶ֨סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Fe-sel [any] graven וּמַסֵּכָ֜ה <S%H4541><s%> u-mas-se-Chah or molten image תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-Vat an abomination יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD מַעֲשֵׂ֛ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh the work יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> ye-Dei of the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> cha-Rash of the craftsman וְשָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> ve-Sam and putteth בַּסָּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> bas-Sa-ter; [it] in [a] secret וְעָנ֧וּ <S%H6030><s%> ve-'a-Nu shall answer כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all manner הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am [place] And all the people וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-me-Ru and say אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed מַקְלֶ֥ה <S%H7034><s%> mak-Leh [be] he that setteth light אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv by his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo; or his mother וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed מַסִּ֖יג <S%H5253><s%> mas-Sig [be] he that removeth גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul landmark רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu; his neighbour's וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur Cursed מַשְׁגֶּ֥ה <S%H7686><s%> mash-Geh to wander עִוֵּ֖ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver [be] he that maketh the blind בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech; out of the way וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur, Cursed מַטֶּ֛ה <S%H5186><s%> mat-Teh [be] he that perverteth מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> mish-Pat the judgment גֵּר־ <S%H1616><s%> ger- of the stranger יָת֖וֹם <S%H3490><s%> ya-Tom fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <S%H490><s%> ve-'al-ma-Nah; and widow וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> 'a-Rur, Cursed שֹׁכֵב֙ <S%H7901><s%> sho-Chev [be] he that lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, with his father's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because גִלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> gil-Lah because he uncovereth כְּנַ֣ף <S%H3671><s%> ke-Naf skirt אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father's וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men. Amen ס sa-Mek
